letters.description: Establish immediate presence by grounding the client in the 'here and now' to bypass cognitive defenses and intellectualization.
Expand the client's sensory and emotional awareness to identify emerging needs and internal resistances in the present moment.
Examine the relational dynamics and environmental factors influencing the client's current experience and contact boundaries.
Process unfinished business and rigid behavioral patterns through creative experiments and phenomenological inquiry.
Synthesize fragmented parts of the self into a unified, authentic, and functional whole, completing the gestalt.
